name: Trash Slime
description:
A slime with the goal of merging with the world by merging with garbage of differing sizes to increase its size.

The goal is to get big enough so you can cross the river without being destroyed to begin your conquest while dodging gunfire from slime hunters.

Objective: Cross the river to the south within 180 seconds *To cross the river, you need to get your size to 16.

Controls: standard WASD movement controls

Tips: Consuming garbage of the same type can build up combos that grant you a temporary speed boost. Try chaining together the same garbage as much as you can.
